name: ArtLayer
shortdesc: An object within a document that contains the visual elements of the image &#40;equivalent to a layer in the Adobe Photoshop application).

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: fillOpacity
property.shortdesc: The interior opacity of the layer. Range: 0.0 to 100.0.

property.name: layerMaskDensity
property.shortdesc: The density of the layer mask. Range: 0.0 to 100.0.

property.name: layerMaskFeather
property.shortdesc: The feather of the layer mask. Range: 0.0 and 250.0.

property.name: vectorMaskDensity
property.shortdesc: The density of the vector mask. Range: 0.0 and 100.0.

property.name: vectorMaskFeather
property.shortdesc: The feather of the vector mask. Range: 0.0 and 250.0.

property.name: filterMaskDensity
property.shortdesc: The density of the filter mask. Range: 0.0 and 100.0.

property.name: filterMaskFeather
property.shortdesc: The feather of the filter mask. Range: 0.0 and 250.0.

property.name: grouped
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer is grouped with the layer below.

property.name: isBackgroundLayer
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer is a background layer.

property.name: pixelsLocked
property.shortdesc: If true, the pixels in the layer's image cannot be edited.

property.name: positionLocked
property.shortdesc: If true, the pixels in the layer's image cannot be moved within the layer.

property.name: transparentPixelsLocked
property.shortdesc: If true, editing is confined to the opaque portions of the layer.

property.name: kind
property.shortdesc: Sets the layer kind (such as 'text layer') for an empty layer. Valid only when the layer is empty and when 'is background layer ' is false. You can use the 'kind ' property to make a background layer a normal layer; however, to make a layer a background layer, you must set 'is background layer' to true.

property.name: textItem
property.shortdesc: The text that is associated with the layer. Valid only when 'kind' is text layer.

method.name: applyStyle
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified style to the layer.

parameters.name: styleName
parameters.shortdesc: The layer style to apply.

method.name: clear
method.shortdesc: Cuts the layer without moving it to the clipboard.

method.name: copy
method.shortdesc: Copies the layer to the clipboard.

parameters.name: merge
parameters.shortdesc: If true, the copy includes all visible layers. If false, the copy only copies from the current layer.

method.name: cut
method.shortdesc: Cuts the layer to the clipboard.

method.name: merge
method.shortdesc: Merges the layer down, removing the layer from the document. Returns a reference to the art layer that this layer is merged into.

method.name: rasterize
method.shortdesc: Converts the targeted content in the layer into a flat, raster image.

parameters.name: target
parameters.shortdesc: What to rasterize.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.shortdesc: The blur width in pixels. Range: 1.0 to 250.0.

parameters.name: source
parameters.shortdesc: The source for the depth map.

parameters.name: focalDistance
parameters.shortdesc: The blur focal distance (in pixels) for the depth map. RangeL 0 to 255. Valid only when 'source' is transparency or layer mask.

parameters.name: invertDepthMap
parameters.shortdesc: If true, inverts the depth map.

parameters.name: shape
parameters.shortdesc: The shape of the iris.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.shortdesc: The radius of the iris. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: bladeCurvature
parameters.shortdesc: The blade curvature of the iris. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.shortdesc: The rotation of the iris (in degrees). Range: 0 to 360.

parameters.name: brightness
parameters.shortdesc: The brightness for the specular highlights. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.shortdesc: The threshold for the specular highlights. Range: 0 to 255.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of noise. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: distribution
parameters.shortdesc: The distribution value for the noise.

parameters.name: monochromatic
parameters.shortdesc: If true, the noise is monochromatic.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.shortdesc: The angle (in degrees). Range: -360 to 360.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.shortdesc: The radius (in pixels). Range: 1 to 999.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of blur. Range: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: blurMethod
parameters.shortdesc: The blur method to use.

parameters.name: blurQuality
parameters.shortdesc: The smoothness or graininess of the blurred image.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.shortdesc: The blur radius. Range: 0 - 1000.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.shortdesc: The blur threshold. Range: 0 - 1000.

parameters.name: blurQuality
parameters.shortdesc: The smoothness or graininess of the blurred image.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.shortdesc: The smart blur mode.

parameters.name: graininess
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of graininess. Range: 0 to 10.

parameters.name: glowAmount
parameters.shortdesc: The glow amount. Range: 0 to 20.

parameters.name: clearAmount
parameters.shortdesc: The clear amount. Range: 0 to 20.

parameters.name: horizontalScale
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of horizontal distortion. Range: -999 to 999.

parameters.name: verticalScale
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of vertical distortion. Range: -999 to 999.

parameters.name: displacementType
parameters.shortdesc: The displacement type.

parameters.name: undefinedAreas
parameters.shortdesc: The treatment of undistorted areas.

parameters.name: displacementMapFile
parameters.shortdesc: The distortion image map.

parameters.name: distortion
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of distortion. Range: 0 to 20.

parameters.name: smoothness
parameters.shortdesc: The smoothness. Range: 1 to 15.

parameters.name: scaling
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of scaling. Range: 50 to 200.

parameters.name: invert
parameters.shortdesc: If true, the texture is inverted.

parameters.name: texture
parameters.shortdesc: The type of texture.

parameters.name: textureFile
parameters.shortdesc: The file from which to load the texture type.

parameters.name: size
parameters.shortdesc: The ripple size. Range: 1 to 15.

parameters.name: magnitude
parameters.shortdesc: The ripple magnitude. Range: 0 to 20.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.shortdesc: The pinch amount. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: conversion
parameters.shortdesc: The conversion type.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.shortdesc: The ripple amount. Range: -999 to 999.

parameters.name: size
parameters.shortdesc: The ripple size.

parameters.name: curve
parameters.shortdesc: Specification of the shear curve in points as x,y coordinate pairs in the format [[x1, y1],[x2, y2]]. Any number of coordinate pairs can be specified.

parameters.name: undefinedAreas
parameters.shortdesc: The treatment of areas left blank by the distortion.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of distortion. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.shortdesc: The distortion mode.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.shortdesc: The twirl angle. Range: -999 to 999.

parameters.name: generatorNumber
parameters.shortdesc: The number of generators. Range: 1 to 999.

parameters.name: minimumWavelength
parameters.shortdesc: The minimum wave length. Range: 1 to 998.

parameters.name: maximumWavelength
parameters.shortdesc: The maximum wave length. Range: 2 to (minimum wavelength + 1)

parameters.name: minimumAmplitude
parameters.shortdesc: The minimum amplitude. Range: 1 to 998.

parameters.name: maximumAmplitude
parameters.shortdesc: The maximum amplitude. Range: 2 to (minimum amplitude + 1)

parameters.name: horizontalScale
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of horizontal scale (as a percentage). Range: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: verticalScale
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of vertical scale (as a percentage). Range: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: waveType
parameters.shortdesc: The wave type.

parameters.name: undefinedAreas
parameters.shortdesc: The treatment of areas left blank by the distortion.

parameters.name: randomSeed
parameters.shortdesc: The random seed.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of zigzag. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: ridges
parameters.shortdesc: The ridge length.

parameters.name: style
parameters.shortdesc: The zigzag style.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of noise (as a percentage). Range: 0.1 to 400.0.

parameters.name: distribution
parameters.shortdesc: The noise distribution type.

parameters.name: monochromatic
parameters.shortdesc: If true, applies the filter only to the tonal elements in the image without changing the colors.

method.name: applyDustAndScratches
method.shortdesc: Applies the dust and scratches filter.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.shortdesc: The size (in pixels) of the area searched for dissimilar pixels. Range: 1 to 16.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.shortdesc: Determines how dissimilar the pixels should be before they are eliminated. Range: 0 to 255.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.shortdesc: The size of the area searched for pixels of similar brightness. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: brightness
parameters.shortdesc: The flare brightness. Range: 10 to 300.

parameters.name: flareCenter
parameters.shortdesc: The position of the flare center.

parameters.name: lensType
parameters.shortdesc: The lens type.

parameters.name: textureFile
parameters.shortdesc: The texture file. Must be a grayscale Photoshop file.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of sharpening (as a percentage). Range: 1 to 500.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.shortdesc: The radius in pixels. Range: 0.1 to 250.0.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.shortdesc: The contrast threshold. Range: 0 to 255.

parameters.name: eliminateFields
parameters.shortdesc: The fields to eliminate.

parameters.name: createFields
parameters.shortdesc: The method to use to replace eliminated fields.

parameters.name: characteristics
parameters.shortdesc: The custom filter characteristics. This is an array of 25 values that corresponds to a left-to-right, top-to- bottom traversal of the array presented in the Custom dialog in the user interface (Filter>Other>Custom).

parameters.name: scale
parameters.shortdesc: The value by which to divide the sum of the brightness values of the pixels included in the calculation.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.shortdesc: The value to be added to the result of the scale calculation.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.shortdesc: The width (in pixels) of the radius where edge details are retained.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.shortdesc: The choke area (in pixels). Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.shortdesc: The spread area (in pixels). Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: horizontal
parameters.shortdesc: The amount (in pixels) to move the selection horizontally (to the right). Range: -6144 to 6144.

parameters.name: vertical
parameters.shortdesc: The amount (in pixels) to move the selection vertically (downward). Range: -6144 to 6144.

parameters.name: undefinedAreas
parameters.shortdesc: The method for filling areas left blank by the offset.

method.name: adjustLevels
method.shortdesc: Adjusts levels of the selected channels.

parameters.name: inputRangeStart
parameters.shortdesc: The input levels minimum. Range: 0 to 253.

parameters.name: inputRangeEnd
parameters.shortdesc: The input levels maximum. Range: (input range start + 2) to 253.

parameters.name: inputRangeGamma
parameters.shortdesc: The input levels gamma. Range: 0.10 to 9.99.

parameters.name: outputRangeStart
parameters.shortdesc: The output levels minimum. Range: 0 to 253.

parameters.name: outputRangeEnd
parameters.shortdesc: The output levels maximum. Range: (output range start + 2) to 253.

method.name: autoLevels
method.shortdesc: Adjust the levels of the selected channels using the auto levels option.

method.name: autoContrast
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the contrast of the selected channels automatically.

method.name: adjustCurves
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the tonal range of the selected channel using up to fourteen points.

parameters.name: curveShape
parameters.shortdesc: The curve points. The number of points must be between 2 and 14.

parameters.name: brightness
parameters.shortdesc: The brightness amount. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: contrast
parameters.shortdesc: The contrast amount. Range: -100 to 100.

method.name: adjustColorBalance
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the color balance of the layer's component channels.

parameters.name: shadows
parameters.shortdesc: The adjustments for the shadows. The array must include three values (in the range -100 to 100), which represent cyan or red, magenta or green, and yellow or blue, when the document mode is CMYK or RGB.

parameters.name: midtones
parameters.shortdesc: The adjustments for the midtones. The array must include three values (in the range -100 to 100), which represent cyan or red, magenta or green, and yellow or blue, when the document mode is CMYK or RGB.

parameters.name: highlights
parameters.shortdesc: The adjustments for the highlights. The array must include three values (in the range -100 to 100), which represent cyan or red, magenta or green, and yellow or blue, when the document mode is CMYK or RGB.

parameters.name: preserveLuminosity
parameters.shortdesc: If true, luminosity is preserved.

method.name: desaturate
method.shortdesc: Converts a color image to a grayscale image in the current color mode by assigning equal values of each component color to each pixel.

parameters.name: selectionMethod
parameters.shortdesc: Modifies the amount of a process color in a specified primary color without affecting the other primary colors.

parameters.name: reds
parameters.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: yellows
parameters.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: greens
parameters.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: cyans
parameters.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: blues
parameters.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: magentas
parameters.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: whites
parameters.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: neutrals
parameters.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameters.name: blacks
parameters.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

method.name: mixChannels
method.shortdesc: Modifies a targeted (output) color channel using a mix of the existing color channels in the image. (output channels = An array of channel specifications. For each component channel, specify a list of adjustment values (-200 to 200) followed by a 'constant' value (-200 to 200).) When monochrome = true, the maximum number of channel value specifications is 1. Valid only when 'document mode' = RGB or CMYK. RGB arrays must include four doubles. CMYK arrays must include five doubles.

parameters.name: outputChannels
parameters.shortdesc: A list of channel specifications. For each component channel that the document has, you must specify a list of adjustment values followed by a 'constant' value.

parameters.name: monochrome
parameters.shortdesc: If true, uses monochrome mixing. Note: If this is true, you can only specify one channel value.

method.name: invert
method.shortdesc: Inverts the colors in the layer by converting the brightness value of each pixel in the channels to the inverse value on the 256-step color-values scale.

method.name: equalize
method.shortdesc: Redistributes the brightness values of pixels in an image to more evenly represent the entire range of brightness levels within the image.

method.name: threshold
method.shortdesc: Converts grayscale or color images to high-contrast, B/W images by converting pixels lighter than the specified threshold to white and pixels darker than the threshold to black.

parameters.name: level
parameters.shortdesc: The threshold level.

method.name: posterize
method.shortdesc: Specifies the number of tonal levels for each channel and then maps pixels to the closest matching level.

parameters.name: levels
parameters.shortdesc: The tonal levels. Range: 2 to 255.

method.name: photoFilter
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the layer's color balance and temperature as if a color filter had been applied.

parameters.name: fillColor
parameters.shortdesc: The color to use for the fill.

parameters.name: density
parameters.shortdesc: The density (as a percentage) of the filter effect. Range: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: preserveLuminosity
parameters.shortdesc: If true, luminosity is preserved.

method.name: shadowHighlight
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the range of tones in the shadows and highlights.

parameters.name: shadowAmount
parameters.shortdesc: The shadow amount, as a percentage. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: shadowWidth
parameters.shortdesc: The shadow width, as a percentage. Range: 0 to 100 for tonal width (0 = narrow), (100 = broad).

parameters.name: shadowRaduis
parameters.shortdesc: The shadow radius (in pixels). Range: 0 to 2500.

parameters.name: highlightAmount
parameters.shortdesc: The highlight amount, as a percentage. Range: 0 to 100.

parameters.name: highlightWidth
parameters.shortdesc: The highlight width. Range: 0 to 100 for tonal width (0 = narrow), (100 = broad).

parameters.name: highlightRaduis
parameters.shortdesc: The highlight radius (in pixels). Range: 0 to 2500.

parameters.name: colorCorrection
parameters.shortdesc: The amount to adjust the colors in the changed portion of the image. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: midtoneContrast
parameters.shortdesc: The amount of midtone contrast. Range: -100 to 100.

parameters.name: blackClip
parameters.shortdesc: Fractions of whites to be clipped. Range: 0.000 to 50.000.

parameters.name: whiteClip
parameters.shortdesc: Fractions of blacks to be clipped. Range: 0.000 to 50.000.
